src:
Masih Loyo, IHSG Diprediksi Dibuka Melemah
07 Nov 2019, 01:55 by Artha Sekuritas


Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - IHSG ditutup melemah pada perdagangan kemarin. IHSG ditutup melemah di level 6.217,54 (-0,74%), pelemahan didorong oleh sektor keuangan (-1,60%) dan infrastruktur (-1,18%). IHSG ditutup melemah setelah data penjualan retail tercatat turun ke level 0,7%. Selain itu dari sektor keuangan melemah cukup signifikan setelah adanya kekhawatiran akan kembali turunnya suku bunga.Sementara itu, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,56 (-0,00%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.410,63 (-0,29%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.076,77 (+0,07%). Bursa saham AS ditutup melemah tanpa banyak pergerakan. Investor masih cemas terhadap diskusi tentang AS-China yang belum ada realisasi hingga saat ini. AS-China masih belum menentukan lokasi pertemuan dan isi dari perjanjian fase 1 secara konkret. Investor menilai peningkatan saham dalam beberapa waktu lalu tidak akan bertahan lama tanpa adanya progres dari ekonomi yang benar-benar nyata. Bursa Asia dibuka melemah mengikuti pergerakan dari indeks saham AS. Investor masih menanti perkembangan dari AS-China terkait perang dagang. Saat ini belum ada sentimen lainnya yang mendorong indeks Asia.IHSG diprediksi melemah:

Resistance 2: 6,306
Resistance 1: 6,261
Support 1: 6,185
Support 2: 6,154

IHSG diprediksi melemah. Secara teknikal indikator stochastic mulai menyempit dan pelemahan didukung oleh volume yang cukup tinggi mengindikasikan tren pelemahan masih akan berlanjut namun akan terbatas. Pergerakan diperkirakan akan fluktuatif menjelang rilis data cadangan devisa. Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
Still Sluggish, JCI Predicted to Open Weakening
Nov 7 2019, 01:55 by Artha Sekuritas


Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - JCI closed lower in yesterday's trade. JCI closed lower at 6,217.54 (-0.74%), weakening was driven by the financial sector (-1.60%) and infrastructure (-1.18%). The Jakarta Composite Index closed lower after retail sales data fell to the level of 0.7%. In addition, the financial sector weakened quite significantly after fears of a decline in interest rates. Meanwhile, the United States (US) exchanges closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.56 (-0.00%), NASDAQ closed 8,410.63 (-0.29%), S&P 500 closed 3,076.77 (+ 0.07%). US stock markets closed lower without much movement. Investors are still worried about the US-China discussion which has not been realized until now. The US-China has not yet determined the location of the meeting and the contents of the phase 1 agreement concretely. Investors assess the increase in shares in the past will not last long without the progress of the economy that is really real. Asian markets opened lower following the movements of the US stock indexes. Investors are still waiting for developments from the US-China related to the trade war. Currently there are no other sentiments driving the Asian index. The JCI is predicted to weaken:

Resistance 2: 6,306
Resistance 1: 6,261
Support 1: 6,185
Support 2: 6,154

JCI is predicted to weaken. Technically, the stochastic indicator is starting to narrow and the weakening is supported by a high volume indicating the weakening trend will continue but will be limited. The movement is expected to fluctuate ahead of the release of foreign exchange reserve data. Check out the video "Dollar Breaks Rp. 14,200" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
